messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] About my house
messages.msgSnippet: ... Harry Potter references. You should watch the DVDs, or better even read the books! Harry has to live with his aunt, uncle and cousin, the Dursleys.
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 30, 2006, at 10:39 AM, patricia tidmore wrote:

> I usually just lurk n learn,but ...and please forgive my
> ignorance,but what is a "Weasley house"? I am so curious it brought
> me out of lurkdom!


Harry Potter references.

You should watch the DVDs, or better even read the books!

Harry has to live with his aunt, uncle and cousin, the Dursleys.
Sometimes he gets to visit his friend Ron Weasley's family at their
house.

Sandra

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] About my house
messages.msgSnippet: ... The Weasley house was the house with a large family full of love, diversity, and dissheveledness in Harry Potter stories. The Dursley house was Harry s
messages.messageBody:
>>what is a "Weasley house"?<<
>>also a Dursley house?<<

The Weasley house was the house with a large family full of love, diversity,
and dissheveledness in Harry Potter stories.

The Dursley house was Harry's aunt and uncle with whom he lived and it was
neat and snobbish and full of meanness.

Jacki

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] About my house
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sandra, I usually just lurk n learn,but ...and please forgive my ignorance,but what is a Weasley house ? I am so curious it brought me out of lurkdom!
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sandra,
I usually just lurk n learn,but ...and please forgive my ignorance,but what is a "Weasley house"? I am so curious it brought me out of lurkdom!
Oh,and also a Dursley house?
Thanks,
Tricia
Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:
Tonight a friend of Kirby's was here. I don't know her very well;
I've just met her once before. She came down to watch Desperate
Housewives with me and Holly, until time for her to go out to eat
with some of the other older kids.

At the commercial, she said "I'm in love with your house!" I thanked
her, and asked if she had seen the whole thing, seen the back, and
she said yes, she had gotten the full tour. She was all big smiles
and said "It's the Weasley's House!"

I had a twinge of shame at the jumbliness of it all, but honestly I
love the Weasley house and wouldn't want to live in a Dursley house.
(I don't think I'll ever have to worry about that.)


Sandra

P.S. When they went out to eat, at Bennigan's, they took Holly with
them. That's pretty sweet. Marty was already in bed before 8:00.
He works early and hasn't been feeling well.

"When I get to where I'm going on the other side of the sky the first thing I'm gonna do is spread my wings and fly I'm gonna land besidwe a lion and run my fingers thru his main Or I might find out what it's like to ride a raindrop,"
